name: Fear In The Rooms VR
description:
VR ONLY!

The game is in BETA! Not full release! Can contain bugs. Appreciate for helping with all the bugs. 

Discord Channel where you can get all the information about the upcoming changes and updates : https://discord.gg/H9v9aEvdWJ

This is my first developed game for VR, which works fine with Quest 2 headset and others Oculus(Meta) headsets.  The game was tested also with Valve Index VR. Had some misalignment with hand positions, but in overall works fine. 

I am trying to make this short experience based on several fears of people. What fears there will be, you will find out while playing. 

I will be appreciated if you help me with testing this game and leaving bug reports in my discord channel. This will make me move forward with improving my self in developing.
